p: In a laminar flow cabinet, the surface of the fruits was disinfected with 70% ethanol and left to dry. Following this, the fruits were manually cut in two and each half was placed in a sterile Petri dish with the cut surface down. At the top of an area of 3 × 3 cm of the fruit, 100 microliters of the bacterial culture were distributed. The inoculum was dried for 30 min. The fruits were incubated at 20 °C.
